neurologic_examination: facial weakness on the left side
hypoesthesia on the left posterior of the scalp
strength 0/5 in right upper arm deltoid and biceps
strength 4+/5 in right upper arm triceps
strength 4/5 in left arm finger flexors, extensors, and intrinsic muscles
strength 4−/5 in right leg hip flexion
strength 4−/5 in left leg hip flexion, 4+/5 in knee extension, 4−/5 in knee flexion, 4+/5 in ankle dorsiflexion, 4/5 in plantarflexion
right patellar reflex 2+/4, left patellar reflex 1+/4
right triceps reflex 2+/4, left triceps reflex 1+/4
decreased sensation to pinprick and light touch in various regions

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neurologic examination revealed complete palsy in cranial nerve III on the right side, with a fixed, dilated pupil, and weakness increased in all limbs compared to the earlier examination.
